    <tei-facsimile data-origname="facsimile">

            <tei-zone points="1048,305 1048,495 2035,495 2035,305" id="eSc_textblock_16b8738b" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2242,2164 2286,2217 2265,2320 1325,2320 910,2303 892,2138 934,2102" id="eSc_textblock_be99ecd4" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="1225,2624 1252,2747 1225,2842 689,2825 706,2615 1013,2606" id="eSc_textblock_5b251767" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2657,2367 2657,2842 2621,2861 2074,2861 2074,2860 1404,2842 1413,2350 2466,2350" id="eSc_textblock_c488bbeb" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2401,3092 2365,3249 2277,3284 1935,3284 1876,3306 1105,3306 848,3284 821,3231 821,3065 848,3048 1871,3057 2033,3049 2371,3049" id="eSc_textblock_e4393655" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2648,3348 2675,3375 2657,3558 2058,3567 1979,3558 1932,3514 1219,3505 1164,3452 530,3434 521,3366 556,3348 951,3324 951,3336 2288,3336" id="eSc_textblock_9d2e8e27" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2056,2875 2056,3039 2637,3039 2637,2875" id="eSc_textblock_6aa6819d" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-zone points="2647,2032 2647,625 519,625 519,2032" id="eSc_textblock_f12fe344" data-origname="zone" data-origatts="id points" data-empty=""/>
        </tei-surface>
    </tei-facsimile>
    <tei-text data-origname="text">
        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_16b8738b" type="brand-elements" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">
               Welte-Mignon
            </tei-name>
            <tei-hi rendition="#k" class="k" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
               <tei-seg ana="#virtual_presence" type="topic slogan" resp="#np" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="resp type ana">
                  The Master's Fingers on Your Piano
              </tei-seg>
            </tei-hi>
         </tei-div>

         <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_f12fe344" type="illustration" data-origname="div" data-origatts="type facs">
            <tei-seg ana="#listening" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                <tei-figure data-origname="figure">
                    <tei-desc data-origname="desc">
                        Painting of Pachmann sitting at a piano. Three men in the background observing him.
                    </tei-desc>
                </tei-figure>
            </tei-seg>
        </tei-div>

        <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_be99ecd4" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-seg ana="#immortality" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                <tei-hi rendition="#i" class="i" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">Through You I Live Forever</tei-hi>
            </tei-seg>
         </tei-div>
         <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_c488bbeb" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-quote type="testimonial" data-origname="quote" data-origatts="type">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>"BRAVO! BRAVO! <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte Mignon*</tei-name>! You have
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>given me one of the greatest
                experiences of my
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>life. You have made my fondest dream come true-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>the dream of a perfect recording method and a re-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>producing mechanism
                <tei-seg ana="#immortality" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="ana">
                    thru which my playing as
                    an
                    <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>interpretative artist might live forever.
                </tei-seg>
                You are my
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>undying 'alter ego'–thru you my own invisible hands
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>render the spell of my <tei-persName type="composer" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="type">Chopin</tei-persName>, my
                <tei-persName type="composer" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="type">Liszt</tei-persName>. You have
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>my unqualified endorsement.
                <tei-seg ana="#immortality" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="ana">
                    <tei-hi rendition="#i" class="i" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">Thru you I live forever."</tei-hi>
                </tei-seg>
            </tei-quote>
         </tei-div>
         <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_6aa6819d" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
            <tei-signed data-origname="signed">
                <tei-persName corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/116014490" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp">V. de Pachmann</tei-persName>
            </tei-signed>
         </tei-div>
         <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_5b251767" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-hi rendition="#i" class="i" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>A letter from the great
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
                <tei-persName type="artist" corresp="https://d-nb.info/gnd/116014490" data-origname="persName" data-origatts="corresp type">Vladimir de Pachmann</tei-persName>,
                the idol of
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>his time, the most celebrated
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>pianist of a century; rejuve-
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>nated at 75, and now playing
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>as no one ever played before."
            </tei-hi>
         </tei-div>
         <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_e4393655" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Installed invisibly in any piano,
            <tei-seg ana="#exact_reproduction" resp="#np" type="topic" data-origname="seg" data-origatts="type resp ana">
                <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon* Reproducing Action</tei-name> makes that
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>piano reproduce with absolute perfection the playing of the master pianists.
            </tei-seg> The
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Library contains thousands of beautiful recordings. You can choose from 112
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>standard makes of pianos that now install the
            <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte-Mignon* Reproducing Action</tei-name>.
            <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>Send for the beautiful art brochure
         </tei-div>
         <tei-div facs="#eSc_textblock_9d2e8e27" data-origname="div" data-origatts="facs">
            <tei-hi rendition="#c" class="c" data-origname="hi" data-origatts="rendition">
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>
                <tei-orgName key="auto.pneumatic.action" data-origname="orgName" data-origatts="key">The AUTO PNEUMATIC ACTION CO.</tei-orgName>,
                <tei-address data-origname="address">
                  653 West 51st Street, New York
                </tei-address>
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/><tei-persName data-origname="persName">WILLIAM C. HEATON</tei-persName>, President
                <tei-lb data-origname="lb" data-empty=""/>*Licensed under original <tei-name type="brand" data-origname="name" data-origatts="type">Welte Mignon</tei-name> patents
            </tei-hi>
         </tei-div>
    </tei-text>
</tei-TEI>
